code:
/**
 * @fileoverview This file configures the Redux store for the application.
 * @description It combines various slices (auth, project, pathway) into a single store.
 */import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import authReducer from'../features/auth/authSlice';import projectReducer from'../features/project/projectSlice';import pathwayReducer from'../features/pathway/pathwaySlice';/**
 * @description Configures and creates the Redux store.
 * @returns {object} The configured Redux store.
 */export const store=configureStore({reducer:{auth:authReducer,project:projectReducer,pathway:pathwayReducer}});
